            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>Niagara Coastal is a non-profit organization with a collective approach to environmental governance. We unite coastal residents, eNGOs, educational institutes, and various levels of government with a common agenda of building a healthy and resilient Great Lakes coastal ecosystem that can support the needs of the community.

We operate various community initiatives, including the Visual Assessment Survey Tool (VAST), which engages people in capturing photos of the Great Lakes shoreline to monitor the coast.

Water quality data are collected using tools in the Water Rangers Freshwater Explorer testkit, including portable probes and test strips, conductivity meter, secchi disc, and dissolved oxygen tests. Long term trends are tracked and logged on the Water Rangers data platform.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-iwfb-lr36
notes:
Niagara Coastal is a non-profit organization with a collective approach to environmental governance. We unite coastal residents, eNGOs, educational institutes, and various levels of government with a common agenda of building a healthy and resilient Great Lakes coastal ecosystem that can support the needs of the community.

We operate various community initiatives, including the Visual Assessment Survey Tool (VAST), which engages people in capturing photos of the Great Lakes shoreline to monitor the coast.

Water quality data are collected using tools in the Water Rangers Freshwater Explorer testkit, including portable probes and test strips, conductivity meter, secchi disc, and dissolved oxygen tests. Long term trends are tracked and logged on the Water Rangers data platform.

notes_translated.en:
Niagara Coastal is a non-profit organization with a collective approach to environmental governance. We unite coastal residents, eNGOs, educational institutes, and various levels of government with a common agenda of building a healthy and resilient Great Lakes coastal ecosystem that can support the needs of the community.

We operate various community initiatives, including the Visual Assessment Survey Tool (VAST), which engages people in capturing photos of the Great Lakes shoreline to monitor the coast.

Water quality data are collected using tools in the Water Rangers Freshwater Explorer testkit, including portable probes and test strips, conductivity meter, secchi disc, and dissolved oxygen tests. Long term trends are tracked and logged on the Water Rangers data platform.
notes_translated.fr:
Niagara Coastal est une organisation à but non lucratif qui adopte une approche collective en matière de gouvernance environnementale. Nous réunissons les résidents côtiers, les ONGE, les établissements d'enseignement et les différents niveaux de gouvernement autour d'un programme commun visant à créer un écosystème côtier des Grands Lacs sain et résilient capable de répondre aux besoins de la communauté.

Nous gérons diverses initiatives communautaires, notamment le Visual Assessment Survey Tool (VAST), qui incite les gens à prendre des photos du littoral des Grands Lacs afin de surveiller la côte.

Les données sur la qualité de l'eau sont collectées à l'aide des outils du kit de test Water Rangers Freshwater Explorer, notamment des sondes portables et des bandelettes de test, un conductimètre, un disque Secchi et des tests d'oxygène dissous. Les tendances à long terme sont suivies et enregistrées sur la plateforme de données Water Rangers.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Niagara Coastal Community Based Water Monitoring

title_translated.en: Niagara Coastal Community Based Water Monitoring
title_translated.fr: Surveillance de l'eau basée sur la communauté côtière de Niagara

title_translation_method.fr: Title text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate
